transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan, good afternoon sir, Rahul baat kar raha hu mai IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan sir, wo abhi mere se galti se video call ke liye ye ho gaya.
Executive: Are sir yaha ticket khul jata hai na is wajah se dikkat ho jati hai.
Customer: To ek kaam karo na.
Executive: Haan boliye, ek kaam karta hu, mai abhi link bhej de raha hu, aap join kar lo, thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Usme do teen chije discuss kar lete hai, uske baad aap cut kar dena.
Executive: Thik hai, kyuki wo ticket khul jati hai to karna padta hai.
Customer: Okay, samajh gaya sir. Wo link nahi aaya.
Executive: Ticket ID aa gaya sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Mail aa gaya hai.
Executive: Haan haan. Bas.
Customer: Link nahi aaya abhi tak, yahi wo hai.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Rahul sir.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan sir link nahi aaya abhi tak aap jo keh rahe the.
Executive: Isi page gaya hoga office aapka ye hai na jo mail office@.in hog drug machine. Us mail pe dekho.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan sir aa gaya.
Customer: Thoda wait kar to baghrai.
Customer: Ho aaste ki.
Customer: Mai. Haan ji, cutter khaye ghalta hote. Aila lagbhag ek minute.
Customer: Thoda madat thoda madat yachi.
Customer: Maiti hai aapun tyachavar. Marla ka.
Customer: Ho ho. Thodi der lagli.
Customer: Maiti maiti.
Customer: Kay karaychay.
Customer: He pathavle vikat.
Customer: Haan sir join ho gaya hu mai Google Meet pe aa gaya.
Executive: Join with Google Meet kar liya aapne?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Mai mai to khud already joined hu lekin aap dikh nahi rahe isme.
Customer: Thik hai beta. Jo aapne link bheji hai usi par maine join with Google Meet karke aaya hai. With Google Meet pe haan us pe continue kara hoga aapne.
Customer: Join with Google Meet jo hai us pe click kara aapne?
Customer: Haan sir us pe jaane ke baad mera chalu ho gaya yaha pe screen aa gayi. Lekin dikh nahi raha aap dikh nahi rahe.
Executive: Is browser mein. Achha mera nahi dikh raha hai.
Customer: Ek minute achha. Ye email ID aapko kaun sa aa raha hai? Kamat pumpen karke aa raha hai.
Executive: Kya karke aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Kamat pumpen India.
Executive: Nahi Rahul Kumar Singh ke naam se gaya hoga aapke mail.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Executive: Sir ek minute aap merge kar raha hu thik hai. Apan jya vyaktishi bolat aahat.
Customer: Hello. Haan sir bola ki.
Customer: Saaheb tumhi mala pathavlele location mahit hai te. Saaheb tumhi pathavlele.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Te location la pahila location la aata te kutlya location madhe sarancha te address hai yacha office cha. Ha ha. Tithun laamb hai te. He je aata hai ki nahi te certificate var jo address hai ki nahi to office cha address hai tikde aapla plant hai sir.
Customer: Plant tumhi je takle location te plant hai. Tithla plant hai. Ha ha ha tithla plant hai. Ani te address pan tyanch dila hai mala tyani tyacha. Hmm. Installation address. Ha ha ha ha. Office cha address dila hai mala kutla to ek 97 kagad.
Customer: Ek minute ha kagad tyacha dila hai. Me mhatla ka asa kahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi to office kuch nahi hai. Ha plant aapla tikde hai fakt. Aata te CL5 speed. Ha CL5 speed spindle. Kiti khara aapla kay vishay mahit hai 197 kagad dila hai bagha. Ha barobar barobar barobar barobar. Ani ji 29 jo hai na to aapla address hai. A office cha address hai. Mag ithe yeto aata he takla na me tith location la. 1000 meter 1000 meter ho 12 kilometer hai sir te. Nahi 1000 meter te he dakhte tower dakhte aapla je tumhi pathavle location na. Ha ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join Google Meet.

- Customer says the location is showing plant address.



Resolution:

- Executive sent a Google Meet link.

- Executive tried to help customer join Google Meet.

- Executive confirmed the address to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- google meet, address, location, plant
